Title: Smart.Deal Skeleton Men Pocket Watch Bronze Hand Wind Mechanical Roman Numerals
Description: Smart.Deal Skeleton Men Pocket Watch Bronze Hand Wind Mechanical Roman Numerals Features: 1.Classic style pocket watch is the best gift for your love, seniority or yourself 2.100% brand new with excellent workmanship 3.Elegant design with precise mechanical movement 4.Skeleton dial shows exquisite movement and structure within the watch 5.With Removable chain 6.Nice addition to a formal or casual dressing or colleting 7.Color may not appear as exactly as in real life due to variations between the computer monitors and nacked eye color difference. How to use/set mechanical pocket watch Once you receive the mechanical watch: A. Setting time Press the crown at the top of watch, the front plate will open. Pull the crown away from base of the watch and turn the crown clockwise until reaching the exact time. B. Winding the watch Push the crown back into place along the base of the watch and winding up the watch clockwise rotation with 10-15 turns. The power will be full(Over winding will ultimately break the spring). Do this one time each day (before sleeping). Otherwise, it will stop working. Please do not over winding up the watch if you feel the crown is tight. Specification (1 cm=10 mm=0.394 inch) (approximate) Case diameter: 47mm approx. Case thickness: 16.50mm approx.(cover included) Case Material: Copper Chain Length: 360mm approx.
